subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony had 37 points, including the 3-pointer that gave the Knicks, who blew an 8-point lead down the stretch, the lead for good against Washington with 15.5 seconds left.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony had 37 points, including the 3-pointer that gave the Knicks, who blew an 8-point lead down the stretch, the lead for good against Washington with 15.5 seconds left.
